idea-plugin.name: Remote call
idea-plugin.description:
IntelliJ IDEA plugin for remote call some procedures.
At the moment it can open the files on http GET-request to localhost:8091 with "message" parameter looking like "FileName.java:89" or "any/path/FileName.java:89". In this case plugin will try to find the most appropriate file basing on the specified path in opened projects and navigate to it.
Send requests permitted only from localhost.
